properties.name: CaCertificatesBundleS3Bucket
properties.description: The name of the S3 bucket to fetch the CA certificate bundle from.

type.description: The name of the S3 bucket to fetch the CA certificate bundle from.

properties.name: CaCertificatesBundleS3Key
properties.description: The name of the S3 object to fetch the CA certificate bundle from.

type.description: The name of the S3 object to fetch the CA certificate bundle from.

properties.name: CaCertificatesBundleS3ObjectVersion
properties.description: The version of the S3 bucket that contains the CA certificate bundle.

type.description: The version of the S3 bucket that contains the CA certificate bundle.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the trust store.

type.description: The name of the trust store.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The tags to assign to the trust store.

type.description: The tags to assign to the trust store.

properties.name: NumberOfCaCertificates
properties.description: The number of certificates associated with the trust store.

type.description: The number of certificates associated with the trust store.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: The status of the trust store, could be either of ACTIVE or CREATING.

type.description: The status of the trust store, could be either of ACTIVE or CREATING.

properties.name: TrustStoreArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the trust store.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the trust store.
